properties.name: _Florida Unorg. FT
properties.note:
Florida Unorg. FT (1819-02-22)

1819/02/22 -> 1822/03/29

Spain ceded East Florida and West Florida (i.e., all territory east of the Perdido River) to the United States. Exchange of ratifications was delayed until 21 February 1821.

(Fuller, 307, 323; Parry, 70:1-7; Swindler, 2:309; Van Zandt, 27)
